channel.title: Best Runescape Bot / Botting Tool?
channel.description: Well ive been getting my levels the legitimate way for awhile and I have decided that mining is taking too long. So I want to bot my mining up a bit and from there I will probably go legit again, but until then what is the best botting program I can use for mining? I have a little money to spend if It is going to cost me so don't exclude those. Also, what are the chances of getting caught botting, if they are pretty good I will just forget it and stay legit. Also to moderators if this is against the rules please remove it but I read the rules before posting this and I didn't see anything that said I couldn't post this, correct me if I am wrong.

item.title: Best Runescape Bot / Botting Tool?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

People…people lol
Runescape Unsigned Client links are on this page:
Caution before clicking because of http referrer

Oldschool RuneScape

Play Old School RuneScape - World Server List

Challenging levelling system and risk-it-all PvP. Experience the world of Old School RuneScape.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Runescape Bot / Botting Tool?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ok, open the Java Plugin Control Panel, 3rd tab over is Security, click button that says Certificates, it shows you all the trusted certificates, delete them all and you should be good.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

You don’t removing then clearing the cache will fix it?
Edit: your right, it’s not even asking me to install java.
Problem is, i’m on an italian computer so when i open the jcp i have no idea what its saying. [vacation]
cba with google translate

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Nope, I just ran the unsigned applet with no problem. The reason it isn’t asking you is because you clicked ‘ok’ with the ‘always trust this publisher’ box checked. I’m not sure how you clear it, probably from the Java Control Panel.

item.title: Best Runescape Bot / Botting Tool?
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:49, topic:345406”][quote author=cows_be_sacred link=topic=441784.msg3280782#msg3280782 date=1279854281]
Just a stupid question here but, how would you run unsigned java client in the newer homepage of runescape?
Thanks.
[/quote]disable javascript[/quote]
Done, but I’m not sure that fixed it.

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:50, topic:345406”][quote author=cows_be_sacred link=topic=441784.msg3280782#msg3280782 date=1279854281]
Just a stupid question here but, how would you run unsigned java client in the newer homepage of runescape?
Thanks.
[/quote]

On any version of runescape’s pages, past, present or future, click ‘cancel’ when asked if you want to run their signed applet.[/quote]
It wont ask me any more. How can I get it to do that?
It will just automatically start loading even with jscript disabled.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Runescape Bot / Botting Tool?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:37, topic:345406”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=441784.msg3251404#msg3251404 date=1277781723]

This bot has impressed me also, I wish he would whip some more bots up though…

Yeah for real, im kinda disappointed though. I had bought all the runes it suggested by two, it said that it would be 3 hours 30 minutes, I started the 4 hour trial, it ended up halfway through graveyard and did not start the one that needs 1200 for infinity boots in 4 hours. Ethier way I bought 100 hours and im going to use it starting tomorrow at 10am, then go running rofl.
[/quote]

Get B2P first because with just B2B the time taken to do graveyard is much longer.[/quote]

I don’t think I have enough runes to get there, and then have enough to get infinty boot after that. I might have to do get enough money first from inifnity boots then get b2p. But thanks for the info.

Read full topic
